description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying this tab suppression configuration record.
Business identifier for the suppression profile (role, site, or organization name); used to select which tab rules apply.
Human-readable label for the suppression profile.
Flag indicating this profile is the default tab visibility configuration when no more specific profile is matched.
Encoded tab-visibility rules by form and tab/section IDs (e.g., form:tabX·items|tabY·items) defining which tabs are hidden; format is system-specific; confirm exact delimiters and semantics with SME.
Date and time this record was last updated.
Likely identifier of the user who last modified the record; sample resembles a timestamp—confirm data type and intent with SME.
User ID that created the record.
User ID that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification.
